dialogue: It has come to my attention that you used the fax for personal business.
I sent the fax during lunch.
You're using up all of our fax paper.
The paper doesn't travel through the phone lines.
I had a friend fax us a wad of extra electricity.
I'm using it right now to power my PC.
Did you get any extra electricity?
Press the button on the back and I'll fax you some.
